data.name: The Bell
data.passiveDescription: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to {{20//23//26//29//32%}} of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every {{45//45//45//45//45}}s. While protected by a shield, the character gains {{12//15//18//21//24%}} increased DMG.
